project_descr: Strengthening climate services and early warning systems in the Gambia for climate resilient development and adaptation to climate change – 2nd Phase of the GOTG/GEF/UNEP LDCF NAPA Early Warning Project

outputs.output_descr: This project will invest in strengthening current systems to lead to a fully operational EWS for the Gambia at the institutional level which can in turn serve local communities particularly in remote and vulnerable regions.

document_name: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/GMB/The Gambia EWS prodoc 5156 - for REsubmission jul 11-14 (3).pdf
project_title: early warning-strengthening climate services in gambia
